structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.text: To the extent to which it is used in determining the liability of any fund of the retirement system, the board of trustees shall ascertain the correctness of the statement filed under KRS 161.480 by the best evidence it is able to obtain. If official records are not available as to length of service, age, salary, or other information required for the administration of the retirement system, the board may use its discretion as to the evidence to be accepted.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 505, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 43, sec. 9. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4506b-30.
